com.twitter.heron.scheduler.api

Interface IConfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuroraConfigLoader, Base64ConfigLoader, DefaultConfigLoader, LocalConfigLoader, MesosConfigLoader

    public interface IConfig
    Config loader interface which will be used to parse and load scheduler config.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getActivatorClass()
      Returns activator class name from config file.
      java.lang.String getDeactivatorClass()
      Returns decativator class name from config file.

      Returns packing algorithm class.

      Loads config file from disk.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        boolean load(java.lang.String configFile,
           java.lang.String cmdlineOverrides)
        Loads config file from disk.
        Parameters:
        configFile - location of scheduler config file.
        cmdlineOverrides - Commandline overrides passed to submitter. The override is encoded as String. SubmitterMain and SchedulerMain will pass all extra arguments as override.
        Returns:
        true, If successful in loading config. False if config verify failed.

      • getUploaderClass

        java.lang.String getUploaderClass()
        Returns uploader class name from config file.
        Returns:
        uploader class name. (Must implement IUploader)

        Returns killer class name from config file.
        Returns:

      • getRuntimeManagerClass

        java.lang.String getRuntimeManagerClass()

      • getSchedulerLocation

        java.lang.String getSchedulerLocation(SchedulerServer schedulerServer)
        Returns scheduler DNS address. This could be host:port or a dns address for http rest exported by scheduler.
        Parameters:
        schedulerServer - Rest server started for scheduler.
        Returns:
        url to reach scheduler REST endpoint

      • getPackingAlgorithmClass

        java.lang.String getPackingAlgorithmClass()
        Returns packing algorithm class.

      • isVerbose

        boolean isVerbose()
        Return true if verbosity is set.
        Returns:
        True if verbosity is set
